## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description          | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | -------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `hasError`   | `has-error`   | Displays error       | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `helperText` | `helper-text` | Text to be displayed | `string`  | `undefined` |
